title: Stadium construction/renovation costs UEFA EURO 2016
summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Stadiums, and Construction/renovation costs in million euros in each Stadiums on the y axis.

The maximum Construction/renovation costs in million euros 381.0 is found at Stadiums Stade des Lumières Lyon (new stadium) and the minimum is found at Stadium Municipal Toulouse (major renovation) where Stadiums is 60.0.
The highest Stadiums Stade des Lumières Lyon (new stadium) has 321.0 more Construction/renovation costs in million euros than the lowest Stadiums Stadium Municipal Toulouse (major renovation).

The Construction/renovation costs in million euros is highest at Stadiums Stade des Lumières Lyon (new stadium) and lowest at Stadiums Stadium Municipal Toulouse (major renovation).

max_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Stadiums, and Construction/renovation costs in million euros in each Stadiums on the y axis.

The Construction/renovation costs in million euros is appeared to be the highest at Stadiums Stade des Lumières Lyon (new stadium) and lowest at Stadiums Stadium Municipal Toulouse (major renovation).
Stadiums Grand Stade LMCU Lille (new stadium) has the second highest value for Construction/renovation costs in million euros.
The highest Stadiums Stade des Lumières Lyon (new stadium) has 321.0 more Construction/renovation costs in million euros than the lowest Stadiums Stadium Municipal Toulouse (major renovation).

Stadiums Stade des Lumières Lyon (new stadium) is higher than any other Stadiumss with value 381.0, followed by Grand Stade LMCU Lille (new stadium), and Stade Vélodrome Marseille (major renovation). Down to Stadiums Stadium Municipal Toulouse (major renovation) with the lowest value 60.0.
Stadiums Stade Bollaert Lens (major renovation), and Stade Geoffroy Guichard Saint-Etienne (major renovation) have a similar Construction/renovation costs in million euros that is 75.0.
The Stadiums Stade des Lumières Lyon (new stadium) has 2.05 times more Construction/renovation costs in million euros than average.
The Construction/renovation costs in million euros is 1670.0 if we add up values of all Stadiumss.
